productInformation.name: Best Sellers Rank
productInformation.value: #65,696 in Tools & Home Improvement (See Top 100 in Tools & Home Improvement) #131 in Cup Dust Safety Disposable Masks

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 20, 2023
reviews.reviewText: This mask has been my go to mask through all of Covid. It is extremely breathable. It’s also comfortable with glasses which is super hard to find when it comes to these mask. I highly recommend this product to everyone and have told all of my family and friends to get it. It’s also a great price for the product.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on March 22, 2022
reviews.reviewText: The reviews almost made me not buy these but for the price, I couldn’t say no. It’s so breathable and roomy to wear. I’m very happy with the quality! It is a little big for me (underneath the chin) but it’s easily fixable.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on June 15, 2020
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Excellent basic mask, easy to keep on in your pocket
reviews.reviewText: This is a good mask for general use. The fit is excellent and it's comfortable. I can easily keep one in my pocket to have handy when needed. I've only found a couple of downsides. First, when handwashing them initially a LOT of dye came out. I was worried that the mask would leave dye on my face, but this isn't the case. Just give them a good wash before using. Second, they don't have wire so they aren't snug around the nose. I can't wear my glasses with fogging them up. It also means that air is technically going in and out of the mask without being filtered. This is not a concern for me and I would definitely buy more. I'm very happy with this purchase.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on May 23, 2020
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Made in Central America
reviews.reviewText: These fit an average or large head well but I think they'd be too big for a small head. The straps around the ears would be too loose.The masks are comfortable and very breathable. I washed them by hand before wearing and some black dye ran out so they aren't color fast. They are labeled machine washable but I'd stick to hand wash and air dry, personally.The fabric is single layer and you can see light through it but not too much. I do wish they had nose wires because they aren't sufficiently snug around the nose but they do cup under the chin well. Lowest price I've seen and made in Guatemala, not China, for once.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 12, 2024
reviews.reviewText: My daughter loves them. Who I bought it for.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on May 25, 2020
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Cost efficient and high quality masks!
reviews.reviewText: The masks were reusable and washable, which made them very cost-efficient!These masks seem higher quality compared to others and made out of cotton. These were one of the most comfortable masks I've worn so far as they fit really well around the face area. They are also breathable! They say that you can also wear a paper mask inside these for better protection. Better safe than sorry, right?I would definitely recommend these masks to my family and friends!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on June 4, 2020
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars If too big, wash and dry on HOT and they should fit
reviews.reviewText: When they first arrived they were too big for my face, but I washed and dried them on the hottest setting, and now they fit my face nice and tight. I’m able to wear these for 8 hours straight at work and they’re super comfy and breathable. No complaints.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 27, 2020
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Reusable Face Cover (Pack of 3)
reviews.reviewText: The C-19 virus has made us do things we don't quite want to do; however, these masks are great. They're cottony soft and comfortable for the average sized person. The stretchy elastic that pulls the mask over your face, loops over your ears and for those individuals who have longer hair, they need not worry because the elastic is material covered and doesn't tangle up. They remind me of T-shirt material and I can honestly say I will be buying another pack of these because I really like that they're thicker than the cheesy paper ones but not overly so as to be uncomfortable.

These are not a medical mask so don't expect a lot of thickness. I have some breathing problems and these masks are wonderful to wear. Sometimes they are a bit loose under my chin but that does help me breathe easier. My husband and I both love them and they fit good.

reviews.reviewTitle: Simple and inexpensive mask. Breathable and light.
reviews.reviewText: There is a mask mandate for the City of Ottawa, requiring us to wear masks at all times in stores, shopping centers, businesses, etc...To that end, having on hand a supply of reusable masks is a necessity. My wife and I share vehicles, and we keep masks in each, as well as in coat pockets etc...These masks proved to be comfortable, very breathable, and with a good price point. Delivery was fast. There are no adjustments on the ear loops, but the material is forgiving and the mask sits comfortably without pulling on my ears. They may not fit all sizes of adults, as the lack of adjustment, but they fit my (big) head.I would certainly buy them again, if I need more. The value is good. The product is good. People are becoming somewhat mask connoisseurs so I will highlight the following if you have preferences:No wire for the nose - but IMO material is soft enough that the wire is unnecessaryNo sewn box for the chin - again soft material makes up for thisNo adjustment stoppers for the ear loops - not an issue for meLight fabricNo pouch for carbon filters - results in lights mask

reviews.reviewTitle: ill fitted, bad choice of fabric for sake of support.
reviews.reviewText: If u tear an old cotton underwear, not really measure but just stick it together and sell it for 20 bucks, u will be selling the exact some thing. and yes, it looks exactly like it sounds, that hanging on my face.the material will keep stretching over use (i havent even had this for a month, used it 5 times so far maybe, not washed it once)the fit is non-existent. I have a normal man head, with a giant nose, this thing keeps falling off my nose. there is usually a little extra bit which hangs off my chin area as well. just use a paper bag. the plastic this thing came in would have made for a better mask.

Would have easily gotten a five star, the only issue is that the size you get is random, and there is no option to select a given fit. First order I made was perfect in terms of fit, so I immediately made a second order but this batch was was way too big and slid down my face most of the time, making them pretty useless. In all fairness to them most likely being manufactured by hand I can understand the difficulty in being consistent with size. Nonetheless, this is just a buyer beware, if you manage to luck out with your order, you'll be satisfied.
